channel.title: happiness-project on Addhana
channel.description: Recent content in happiness-project on Addhana

item.title: Rules of Adulthood
item.description: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems. Habits compound, meaning what you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while. Never miss the same event/habit twice. Don’t judge easily, you never know what the other person is going through. Everything comes with time, so take the time and enjoy the journey.

item.title: The Happiness Project
item.description: Quarantine has been a rediscovery of Dan Harris and his 10% happier project. I’ve attended all his live meditations (while they were running), enrolled in the TPH app, and I’ve been listening to his podcast almost daily. His book (10% happier) was the first audiobook I listened to in the theme of meditation and Buddhism. I was living in Mexico, just recently started dating Ted and I was open to trying new ways to improve my life.
